docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 29 -- Two commonly used anticonvulsant drugs seem to help the body rid itself of DDT.

headline.main: 2 Drugs, Used on Epileptics, Seem to Reduce DDT in Body

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 29 -- Two commonly used anticonvulsant drugs seem to help the body rid itself of DDT.

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr.Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 28 -The Federal Government has watched without interference while many people sickened and some died in an extended series of drug tests and blood plasma projects.

headline.main: Prison Drug and Plasma Projects Leave Fatal Trail; Trail of Injury and Death in Prisons Follows Doctor's Drug and Plasma Programs

docs.abstract: Article discloses work of Dr A R Stough and 9 cos he controls in testing drugs on prisoners and producing hyperimmune gamma globulin from blood plasma of prisoners in Ala, Okla and Ark prison systems while Fed Govt and drug indus failed to interfere despite fact many prisoners contracted hepatitis and some died as result
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 28 -The Federal Government has watched without interference while many people sickened and some died in an extended series of drug tests and blood plasma projects.
